title: Broken Promises & Failed Follow-Through
summary: Trump made grand promises he never delivered: Mexico would pay for the wall (built only 80 miles), 'repeal and replace Obamacare' (failed), $1 trillion infrastructure (never passed), eliminate national debt (added $7.8 trillion).
keyFacts: Border Wall: Promised Mexico would pay, built only 80 miles of new wall, Mexico paid $0, diverted $15 billion from military
Healthcare: Promised 'repeal and replace Obamacare on Day One' - failed despite Republican control of Congress, never presented comprehensive plan
Infrastructure: Promised $1 trillion plan - 'Infrastructure Week' became recurring punchline for 4 years, zero major bills passed
National Debt: Promised to 'eliminate the national debt in 8 years' - added $7.8 trillion in 4 years (40% increase)
'Drain the Swamp': Appointed over 280 lobbyists, multiple cabinet members resigned in corruption scandals
Manufacturing Jobs: Lost 60,000 manufacturing jobs even before COVID
Pattern: 'Coming in two weeks' became go-to delay tactic for things that never materialized

sources.text: U.S. Customs and Border Protection data
